SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,MEMBER_ID ,CATEGORY ,WRITE_DATE ,BOARD_TEXT ,VIEW_COUNT ,ATTACH_FILE FROM BOARDS WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT B.BOARD_NO "boardNo" , B.BOARD_TITLE "boardTitle" , B.MEMBER_ID "memberId" , B.CATEGORY "category" , B.WRITE_DATE "writeDate" , B.BOARD_TEXT "boardText" , B.VIEW_COUNT "viewCount" , B.ATTACH_FILE "attachFile" , case C.MEMBER_ID WHEN 'admin' THEN '답변함' ELSE '답변안됨' END AS "answer" FROM BOARDS B FULL OUTER JOIN COMMENTS C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO WHERE C.MEMBER_ID != 'admin' OR C.COMMENT_NO IS NULL ORDER BY "boardNo" DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO "boardNo" , B.BOARD_TITLE "boardTitle" , B.MEMBER_ID "memberId" , B.CATEGORY "category" , B.WRITE_DATE "writeDate" , B.BOARD_TEXT "boardText" , B.VIEW_COUNT "viewCount" , B.ATTACH_FILE "attachFile" , case C.MEMBER_ID WHEN 'admin' THEN '답변함' ELSE '답변안됨' END AS "answer" FROM BOARDS B FULL OUTER JOIN COMMENTS C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO WHERE B.MEMBER_ID != 'admin' AND TO_CHAR(B.WRITE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND case C.MEMBER_ID WHEN 'admin' THEN '답변함' ELSE '답변안됨' END = '답변안됨' ORDER BY 1

SELECT B.BOARD_NO "boardNo" , B.BOARD_TITLE "boardTitle" , B.MEMBER_ID "memberId" , B.CATEGORY "category" , B.WRITE_DATE "writeDate" , B.BOARD_TEXT "boardText" , B.VIEW_COUNT "viewCount" , B.ATTACH_FILE "attachFile" , case C.MEMBER_ID WHEN 'admin' THEN '답변함' ELSE '답변안됨' END AS "answer" FROM BOARDS B FULL OUTER JOIN COMMENTS C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO ORDER BY "boardNo"

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO "boardNo" , BOARD_TITLE "boardTitle" , WRITE_DATE "writeDate" , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS C WHERE MEMBER_ID = 'admin' AND C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) >= 1 THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS "answer" FROM BOARDS B WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} and category='d2'
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{lastIndex} )WHERE RNUM > #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDS B WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} and category='d2'
